tv.generator-info-name: WebGrab+Plus/w MDB & REX Postprocess -- version V5.2.0.0 -- Jan van Straaten

programme.title: JAG: In Thin Air
programme.desc: Lt. Albrecht and Lt. Cmdr. Zuzello make Zuzello’s farewell flight before he retires. All is fine until Albrecht notices that his partner is passed out from hypoxia. Albrecht makes an emergency landing on the ship.Harm is sent to the ship to investigate.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Need to Know
programme.desc: As a favor from Congresswoman Lillian Dorning, SECNAV Sheffield asks the JAG staff to get the story of a submarine, USS Angel Shark (SSGN-559), which was lost on a CIA mission in 1968.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Friendly Fire
programme.desc: Harm serves as a judge and Mac is the contentious prosecutor in a case fraught withpolitical implications when an American aviator is charged with killing three Britishsoldiers during a flight mission in Afghanistan.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Shifting Sands
programme.desc: When a Gulf War MIA victim is found as the sheik’s wife in a nomadic Arab tribe, Bud prosecutes and Mac defends her against charges of desertion and, in a stunning turn of events, treason. Harm tries to get his old job back but is turned away.(n)

programme.title: JAG: The One That Got Away
programme.desc: Mac defends and Turner prosecutes in the case of a special op marine who, during an Iraqi mission, may have deserted his team for his own survival. Harm takes on a CIA training assignment in a mach six craft that soon has him in danger.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Charades
programme.desc: Team Scorpion is tasked with uncovering a mole inside the CIA whose judgment is clouded by matters of the heart and is being coerced into stealing deadly chemicals.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Forget Me Nots
programme.desc: Team Scorpion must jog the memory of an injured former Secret Service agent who is their only hope of preventing weapons of mass destruction being launched from a secret U.S. nuclear silo.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Love Boat
programme.desc: Team Scorpion goes undercover on a cruise ship to locate and disable deadly stolen rockets.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Going South
programme.desc: Team Scorpion heads to Mexico when a tech billionaire hires them to rescue his kidnapped daughter.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Once Bitten, Twice Die
programme.desc: When a conflict in Eastern Europe threatens to escalate, Team Scorpion is called on to help facilitate secret peace talks to prevent World War III.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Young Hearts Spark Fire
programme.desc: While on a mission to save lost hikers, Team Scorpion's helicopter crashes, igniting a massive wildfire that quickly closes in on them.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Hot & Bothered
programme.desc: A severe heat wave wreaks havoc on the city, forcing the rookies to work around the clock to keep the peace. In the midst of the chaos, Andy discovers that a serial rapist may have resurfaced to prey on vulnerable teenage girls.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Honour Roll
programme.desc: After their High School Outreach assignment goes awry, Andy and Chris stumble on the victim of avicious beating behind a nightclub.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Girlfriend of the Year
programme.desc: After a routine speed trap leads to a messy accident on a city highway, Chris and Gail find one of the cars mysteriously empty and quickly realize that itslicense plate matches the one being broadcast in a citywide “Amber Alert”.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Big Nickel
programme.desc: Andy’s attempt to avoid Swarek is thwarted whenbothare assigned to a prisoner transport. When things go awry and theinmate breaks loose, the two officers are led on a cat-and-mouse foot chase through the meandering woods.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: To Serve or Protect
programme.desc: What was to be a routine day for Andy is abruptly put on holdwhen herex-copper father, Tommy, confesses that he might have committed a serious crime during one of his alcohol-induced blackouts.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Judgment Day
programme.desc: There’s a nervous tension in the air on Judgment Day for all therookies at 15 Division who will have to undergo make-or-break assessments by Staff Sergeant Frank.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Delapre Abbey
programme.desc: The team are joined by five members of the English rugby team as they investigate an all\nbut forgotten piece of British history.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Drakelow Tunnels
programme.desc: p 8: Drakelow Tunnels - Kidderminster: With over 4 miles of haunted tunnels the team have one night to investigate this labyrinth of horror.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Newton House Part 1
programme.desc: The first of a two-part investigation with celebrity guests, world famous band ‘Bullet for My Valentine’.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Newton House Part 2
programme.desc: Part 2 of this spin-chilling episode. Nursing their wounds from the last episode the team and their celebrity guests ‘Bullet For My Valentine’ carry on.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Royal Court Theatre - Bacup
programme.desc: The world famous ghost hunting team return for a new series and start in a small\ntheatre with a big problem…ghosts.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Unexplained Phenomena
programme.desc: This week, TAPS takes a call from the American Legion in Pennsylvania where people are terrified by paranormals.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: America's First Zoo
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to the oldest zoo in the country, The Philadelphia Zoo, which boastsa reported Native American burial ground that lies beneath the grounds.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Knights of the Living Dead
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to Worcester, Massachusetts to investigate the Higgins Armory, the only armory in the western hemisphere devoted to arms and armor.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: French Quarter Phantoms
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS heads to America's most haunted city, New Orleans, to investigate the Old U.S. Mint.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Dark Shadows
programme.desc: The TAPS' team is called out to Newport, RI to hold the first ever-paranormal investigation at Seaview Terrace; best recognized from the TV show Dark Shadows.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Ghosts of Christmas Past
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS gets intothe Christmas spirit at New Hampshire's Christmas Farm Inn.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: All Too Human
programme.desc: Dylan, Beka and Trance go with Rommie to find out about a weapon being developed on a planet that distrusts AI.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Andromeda is tasked with escorting medical ships safely through Drago-Kazov space.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Home Fires
programme.desc: A planet of Commonwealth survivors led by Dylan's former fiancee is invited to join the new Commonwealth, but when they vote not to join, the Magog are suspected of playing dirty.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Into the Labyrinth
programme.desc: An agent of the Abyss tries to lure Harper into joining the Magog.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: When they rescue a young prince from an uprising that kills the rest of his family, Dylan and Tyr are asked to be his advisors.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.50
programme.desc: Man alleges assault by ex-fiancée, sues for damages and unpaid loan for her schooling/Former live-in lover sues estranged husband for over $4,000 in personal loans and child support.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.255
programme.desc: A woman accuses her ex of drug use; he denies it and any owed money. Police intervene in ex-friends' fight over a boy's paintball gun. Dispute over basketball school tuition refund.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.102
programme.desc: A luau-themed birthday party incites a group assault between two sisters and other partygoers; organizers claims the sisters were not originally invited to the party.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.161
programme.desc: A 57-year-old man is accused of sexually propositioning a teenage grocery cashier; he sues her for money she allegedly promised to pay back. A teenager sues her father for the return of furniture that she claims was a Christmas gift.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.164
programme.desc: Ex-lovers dispute maxed-out credit card from alleged gambling binge. Daughter sues father convicted of domestic violence for unpaid attorney fees.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.61
programme.desc: A teenager refuses to take a drug test after denying charges that he smashed a car window and stole a neighbor’s belongings/A female nail technician sues a cosmetologist for money allegedly paid toward an apprenticeship.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.127
programme.desc: 11-year-old girl accused of pouring scalding water on 5-year-old boy; mothers fight over liability and medical expenses/A man sues horse trainer for saddle return; granddaughter sold it.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.115
programme.desc: Man accuses ex-lover of sending explicit photos/Sued for damaging ex-girlfriend's Mustang in accident.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.242
programme.desc: An online romance leads to a lawsuit over unpaid credit card charges, bail for a DUI fine, and excess mileage charges on a leased car. Divorced parents caring for their son after an ATV accident dispute claiming him as a dependent on their tax return.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.199
programme.desc: A teen DD falls asleep at the wheel, totaling a car after giving drunk minors a ride. Co-workers moving in together face bed mix-ups, pet issues, and a broken lease.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.256
programme.desc: A young woman sues ex-business partner for investment return and legal fees. Another sues ex-friend for VW Jetta balance, disputing key handover. Woman sues ex-boyfriend for utility bills, deposit, and debt.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The remaining chefs cater for 40 `glampers' before a hectic dinner service which leads to a difficult decision for the chefs and Gordon himself. Someone will have to pay the ultimate price and be forced to leave the competition at this late stage.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The four remaining chefs are reunited with their loved ones for a taste test, with the winner dining out with their family at a posh restaurant.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Gordon's top two feel the pressure as they prepare their final menus. The pair do not have long to ponder and consider whether a simple or more adventurous approach will win the day.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Ramsay splits the contestants into two teams along gender lines and asks them to present their signature dishes, with the winning team getting to spend an evening with William Shatner.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The men's team get a head start on the first challenge after some successful crab fishing, but can the women edge ahead when it comes to the cooking? Dinner service sees an infuriated Gordon throw an entire team out of the kitchen.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Jose Mas, the CEO of MasTec, one of the largest builders of telecommunication and energy systems in North America, poses as a recently laid off high school basketball coach, getting a second chance at starting a new career.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: PJ’s Pets is one of the nation’s oldest pet store chains, but the company has a new President in place, and she’s determined to rattle a few cages. Margaret Kordas steps out of her stilettos when she spends a week working in her own stores.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Pizza Pizza CEO Paul Goddard goes undercover in the nation’s number one pizza mega brand, and learns that making dough and delivering pizza serves up some challenges he never imagined.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: The Victorian Order of Nurses takes the pressure off hospitals by providing care for people in their own homes. Hundreds of rival companies compete for cash and customers.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Michael Sneyd, CEO of mega resort business Skyline International Development, goes undercover to get creative with the employees at the foot of the chain and take their ideas to new heights.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Rick Silva became CEO of Checkers & Rallys fast food restaurants five years ago, and immediately focused on growing the business at any cost. So he is going undercover to find even more ways to drive sales and please his guests.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Beating the System
programme.desc: When Jeff and Audrey learn their surrogate is pregnant, both of their lives change. Meanwhile, Timmy takes on the responsibility of wedding planner for Adam and Jennifer.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Jeff Photo
programme.desc: When an old photo of Jeff appears in an art gallery, he decides it's time to make some changes in his life. Meanwhile, Russell experiences a slump with women until he sees a familiar face.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Power Couple
programme.desc: Jeff is threatened when Audrey gets a raise and makes almost as much as he does. Meanwhile, Russell enlists Timmy to find out what Liz sees in another man.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Double Down
programme.desc: Jeff and Audrey panic when they are told they might be having twins. Meanwhile, Russell throws a citizenship party for Timmy to impress a girl.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Cheating
programme.desc: Audrey tries to persuade Jeff to eat healthier when he is diagnosed with high cholesterol, but he can’t help sneaking around with Brenda for unhealthy food.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Scavenger Hunt
programme.desc: To try to show his care and interest in their relationship, Jeff sends Audrey on a scavenger hunt, as suggested by Adam. Russell thinks Jennifer has a sex tape and enlists Timmy’s help in finding it.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Last of the Red Hat Lovers
programme.sub-title: The Last of the Red Hat Lovers
programme.desc: Russell books a cruise that he thinks is filled with 'red hot' ladies but instead, it's filled with ladies from the Red Hat society. Meanwhile, Timmy tries to help Jeff and Audrey settle an argument.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Dirty Talk
programme.desc: Russell tries to get out of his marriage to an overly enthused Liz, who tries to make it work, while Jeff attempts to engage Audrey in dirty talk.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Bros Before Nodes
programme.desc: Worried about getting his father's approval, Russell gets Liz all dolled up to meet him.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Audrey Is Dumb
programme.desc: Jeff celebrates Audrey's inability to talk after her node removal surgery. Russell gets Timmy to fire an employee for him, and Adam discovers he's only getting free stuff because of his good looks.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Growing Up Is Hard To Do
programme.sub-title: Growing Up Is Hard To Do
programme.desc: With twelve kids of his own, Dog knows how hard it is to keep children on the straight and narrow, especially during their turbulent teens.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Year of the Dog
programme.desc: A one-hour special that looks back at 2006, one of Dog's most tumultuous years, which has included the passing of Beth's father, Dog and Beth's wedding, the tragic death of Dog's daughter Barbara.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Mystery of Mona Lisa
programme.desc: When Lyssa points out that the fugitive in the next case has the same birth date as Barbara, Dog's recently deceased daughter, the team takes a special vow to capture the young woman.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Rusty Cuffs
programme.desc: Dog finds himself fighting two enemies; the law and his inner demons. He continues his legal battle to fight extradition to Mexico in connection with his 2003 capture of fugitive rapist Andrew Luster. His other struggle is private.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Make a Wish
programme.desc: Dog shows his love of justice and children in this poignant episode. He begins by giving encouragement to a group of handicapped children, then starting the search for Jacob, a fugitive who's abandoned his wife and children.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Tough Love
programme.desc: Michael is out on bail for drug sales, theft, and violation of parole. Dog's after him for failing to appear in court and his only lead is Jen, his co-signer and girlfriend.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Surprise Ending
programme.desc: Dog and the boys are going after a fugitive with a $25,000 bond and a string of theft charges behind him. When the team hits his apartment, they find a boot print on the door, a souvenir of a police raid from only days earlier?(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Fowl Playhouse
programme.desc: When Jase finds out Jep is planning to buy his kids a fancy playhouse from a catalogue, he and the guys decide to build one for Jep themselves. But the playhouse ends up looking more like a military-style duck blind.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: The Big LeCOWski
programme.desc: When Sadie spends the day at Duck Commander for a school project, the guys try to show her the ins-and-outs of how a successful company works. But when Willie questions Jase's ingenuity in creating new products they get into a debate.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: The Robertson family pulls together a family reunion to give Mia a big send-off before her surgery.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Governor's Travels
programme.desc: When the Governor of Louisiana announces that he will be coming to Duck Commander to present Willie with a commerce award, John Luke volunteers to give the introduction speech.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Quack and Gown
programme.desc: With Reed's graduation day approaching, Jase decides to take Reed frog hunting the night before, like he did on the day of his own graduation. Willie and Si join in, and Jase tries to keep them from imparting their "college advice" on Reed.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Hands on a Woodchipper
programme.desc: When Willie agrees to sponsor Mountain Man's radio contest, a "Hands on a Hardbody" competition, he somehow finds himself competing against Si for Mountain Man's last minute prize: a woodchipper.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Quack Draft
programme.desc: When the Robertsons participate in the West Monroe Fire Department pancake breakfast, the firemen invite Willie and his brothers to train with the department for the day. Meanwhile, Phil and Si accompany Miss Kay on a trip to visit a family grave.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Brand of Brothers
programme.desc: When Willie contemplates re-branding the Duck Commander image, Jase takes issue with having an outsider design their image, so he and the guys create their own new logo and business cards. Meanwhile, Willie and Phil help Bella with her science project.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: De-Bug Life
programme.desc: The guys realize it is time for the annual cleaning of the duck blinds when they come across a gator using one as a home. Meanwhile, while the kids are running the church car wash, Si and Willie disagree on the best way to draw in customers.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Men vs. Wild
programme.desc: Brotherly competition is taken to a whole new level when Jase and Willie challenge Alan and Jep to a survival race through the woods on Phil's property. Meanwhile, Si is interested in finding a new hobby when he sees Kay cutting coupons.(n)

programme.title: The Four Warriors
programme.desc: Travelling home, four soldiers discover a village gripped by fear, as residents are abducted by unknown predators. These warriors set out to rescue them and destroy what lurks outside the village.(n)

programme.title: The Philadelphia Experiment
programme.desc: A United States Navy destroyer escort participates in a Navy "invisibility" experiment that inadvertently sends two sailors forty years into the future. Starring: Michael Paré, Nancy Allen, Eric Christmas.(n)

programme.title: Robot Apocalypse
programme.desc: When expert hacker Tara tries to stop a powerful, sentient A.I. as it takes over the world's military, the A.I. marks her as a terrorist.(n)

programme.title: The Heist
programme.desc: A comedy centered on three museum security guards who devise a plan to steal back the artworks to which they have become attached after they are transferred to another museum. Starring: Morgan Freeman, Christopher Walken, Joseph McKenna, Wynn Everett.(n)

programme.title: Temptation: Marriage Counselor
programme.desc: From Tyler Perry comes this provocative story of an ambitious married woman whose temptation by a handsome billionaire leads to devastating, life-altering consequences.(n)

programme.title: Good Witch
programme.desc: A raven-haired enchantress, Cassie Nightingale, mysteriously moves into the local haunted mansion, 'Grey House', and seems to change her neighbors lives using a hint of magic causing many to think she’s a witch.(n)

programme.title: The Cannonball Run
programme.desc: The classic comedy with cool stars and even cooler cars! Based on a true race event, Burt Reynolds leads an all-star cast in the ultimate quest to win The Cannonball Run.(n)

programme.title: Rain
programme.desc: Set in 1968, a German Shepherd enrolled by his family in a training program that will send him to serve American soldiers in Vietnam. Even when Rain is wounded, he saves many, and bonds with a soldier who learns much from this very special dog.(n)

programme.title: Union Bound
programme.desc: Union Bound is a thrilling Civil War film that shows the strength and courage of the human spirit. Sergeant Joseph Hoover went to war to preserve the Union but finds himself captured and sent to a prisoner of war camp.(n)

programme.title: Guess Who’s Coming to Christmas Dinner?
programme.desc: Law student Maya brings her new boyfriend home for the holidays, neglecting to tell her family that he's - well - white. Maya has one week to persuade her family that this is true love, will she be able to pull off this Christmas miracle?(n)

programme.title: All I Want For Christmas
programme.desc: One Christmas a boy wishes he could change places and his dream comes true! But he soon discovers that without his parents and friends it's actually a curse. The only problem is - can he reverse his disastrous wish and get his family back again.(n)

programme.title: Christmas Wish
programme.desc: When Paula chose Gary over Nick, 15 years later she’d be married, with tons of debt. At Christmas, when Nick reappears, now a rich, successful art broker. A little Christmas magic and she is transported to the life with Nick.(n)

programme.title: Mary Higgins Clark
programme.sub-title: Mary Higgins Clark: You Belong To Me
programme.desc: After a radio talk show host takes to the airwaves to discuss recent slayings of lonely women aboard cruise ships, she receives information that leads her to believe she knows the killer and may be the next target.(n)

programme.title: Secrets From Her Past
programme.desc: After witnessing a mob hit, Kate Collins fakes her death and goes into hiding. Ten years later, the unsolved crime is reopened and the mob begins to suspect Kate is still alive. With her new identity compromised Kate must find a way to end the threat….(n)

programme.title: Encounter with Danger
programme.desc: As Jack leaves town for business, he seizes the opportunity to take Lori along so that they rekindle their relationship. But when he disappears, Lori discovers that Jack was about to reveal the corruption that exists within the company….(n)

programme.title: The Single Moms Club
programme.desc: Brought together by their children's potential expulsion from school, diverse single mothers (Nia Long, Amy Smart, Cocoa Brown) form a support group to help one another overcome life's challenges.(n)

programme.title: How to Be a Latin Lover
programme.desc: Forced to live with his sister after his wife dumps him, a desperate man hatches a scheme to seduce a widowed billionaire and live the high life once again.(n)

programme.title: Boo! A Madea Halloween
programme.desc: Cranky, fast-talking Madea (Tyler Perry) finds herself under attack from ghosts, ghouls and zombies after breaking up a fraternity's Halloween party.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: The McCains try to be tolerant of their embittered neighbor Abel MacDonald, but they decide he's gone too far when he won't allow his injured boy to get medical treatment.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: An unfounded rumor causes North Fork's outspoken feminist schoolteacher to be attacked by a mob of angry townspeople.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: When his employer begins to suspect him of embezzlement, bookkeeper Asa Manning decides to hire a professional gunman to take care of the problem.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A drought has forced local cowhands to seek work on a railroad construction project, but executives are afraid workers will desert them if they believe an old man's claim of making rain.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas McCain gives blood to save a dying man and is surprised by Marshall Torrance's odd behavior towards him. Soon, men arrive from a nearby town and demand custody of the man.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: When Mark finds of the body of a murder victim, Lucas, his friend Artemus and Marshall Torrance begin a search for the killer.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: When renegade Apaches wound Lucas and kidnap Mark, Marshall Torrance joins with U.S. Marshall Sam Buckhart to form a rescue posse.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas is the town's representative to the railroad commission until an infamous train robber dies and leaves his ill-gotten wealth to Lucas. Lucas must clear his name.(n)

programme.title: Adventures Of The Wilderness Family
programme.desc: The story of a modern-day family who became bored with the hassles of the city life in Los Angeles and moved to the Rocky Mountains, never to return.(n)

programme.title: Pants On Fire
programme.desc: Fifteen-year-old Jack Parker uses white lies to gain favor and to get out of trouble until his lies start coming true throwing his life into chaos.(n)

programme.title: Time Toys
programme.desc: A group of kids stumble upon a chest full of toys from the future. The discovery takes them on an adventure using their new-found toys to save their neighbourhood and the world from a maniacal madman. A fun, futuristic adventure for all the family.(n)

programme.title: Killers
programme.desc: Spencer is just your average, undercover super-assassin. When he meets Jen, he finds true love. But a picture-perfect marriage won't save Spencer from becoming a target himself. Now Spencer and Jen are on the run for their lives.(n)

programme.title: Everyone Says I Love You
programme.desc: A New York girl sets her father up with a beautiful woman in a troubled marriage while her stepsister gets engaged. Starring: Woody Allen, Goldie Hawn, Julia Roberts, Edward Norton, Drew Barrymore, Natasha Lyonne, Natalie Portman.(n)

programme.title: Battling for Baby
programme.desc: After Katherine (Courteney Cox) decides to return to work to help pay the bills, her baby's grandmothers (Debbie Reynolds & Suzanne Pleshette) argue over who will take care of her child.(n)

programme.title: Account Rendered
programme.desc: A banker's wife is murdered on Hampstead Heath and suspicion is divided between her husband an artist a bank official and a bookmaker.(n)

programme.title: Act of Murder
programme.desc: An actor attempts to win his former mistress back by putting stress on her husband by poisoning their family dog, and the farm animals at their country place, simulating a robbery attempt.(n)

programme.title: Delayed Action
programme.desc: Two criminals do a deal with a suicidal man, who will confess to their crimes before he dies.(n)

programme.title: Dance Hall
programme.desc: Georgie, Carole, Eve, and Mary work in a factory. They find excitement by going to a local dance hall called Chiswick Palais in the evenings. At the dance hall, they face different issues with their romantic partners.(n)

programme.title: Danger Within
programme.desc: British soldiers search for the spy in their midst as they plan a daring escape from a World War II POW camp.(n)

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: Supermax (REDUX)
programme.desc: After Rudolpho sells the Tulip out from under them, the crew scheme to take it back from the new owner, who wants to turn the ship into a maximum security prison.(n)

programme.title: A Century of Science Fiction: Final Frontier
programme.desc: Science fiction has become almost synonymous with outer space - and with good reason. Take a delightful trip among the stars - at warp speed.(n)

programme.title: A Century of Science Fiction: Mad Scientists
programme.desc: Take a look at the many legendary performers who have taken their turn experimenting with the formula of one of sci-fi's greatest tropes: the sinister mad scientist.(n)

programme.title: A Century of Science Fiction: Mutations
programme.desc: From exposure to intense cosmic radiation to a grand experiment experiment gone horribly wrong, mutations have grown and developed into a key component of science fiction DNA.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Devil Doll
programme.desc: A guide leads Sydney and Nigel to an unusual, underground Aztec burial chamber. Instead of a body, they find a relic.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Incognito
programme.desc: Retrieving a mythical lancet, Sydney and Nigel run into Nigel's look-alike just before his death. Nigel gets a cut from the lancet. Later, Cate persuades Nigel to impersonate the man.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: All Choked Up
programme.desc: Carson Inez, a collector, uses an ancient necklace to get Sydney to help her in raising Athena who will then help her conquer the world.(n)

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.sub-title: In the Presence of Mine Enemies
programme.desc: Jesse falls in love with a computer hacker, who Eckhart wants to "procure" in order to corrupt the public computer news channels against New Mutants...and to the GSA's benefit.(n)

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: A boy who's developing new mutant abilities has been kidnapped and the team agrees to find him for his mother. They later learn she was the one who had her son kidnapped.(n)

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: The team encounters some people trying to break into a Genomex lab and discover that they're ferals.(n)

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: A New Mutant with the power of invisibility is working against both Eckhart and Adam, despite the fact she was involved with Adam in the past.(n)

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: An old friend of Brennan's lures him and Emma into a trap. Emma ends up split into two separate entities, one good and one evil.(n)

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: Jesse is roped into a deadly undercover mission by his estranged father, who is working against Eckhart.(n)
